comments.text:
Not just Kohli, SRH fans rally behind all Indian players and there is a reason for this. SRH don’t have an iconic Indian player they can rally behind. They have missed a chance to bring in Ambati Rayudu when Mumbai left him. Even though he is a tier-2 player, he is Telugu and would have given a much needed pump to SRH fans.

The trio of Dhawan-Warner-Kane was the best they had, but all three have left because SRH couldn’t pay them enough.
